articles.author: AFP
articles.title: Ex-Australia skipper Paine accuses Proteas of ball-tampering after 'Sandpaper-gate'
articles.description: Tim Paine has accused South Africa of ball-tampering just days after Australian cricket was rocked by the sandpaper-gate scandal in 2018, alleging it was covered up by the match broadcaster.
articles.content:
Tim Paine has accused South Africa of ball-tampering just days after Australian cricket was rocked by the sandpaper-gate scandal in 2018, alleging it was covered up by the match broadcaster.

articles.title: The birth of the world's first great black batter
articles.description: George Headley was the first iconic black batter but his path to cricket greatness was very different from his contemporary Don Bradman.
articles.content:
George Headley scored 10 hundreds in 22 Tests for the West Indies between 1930 and 1954
The wooden house in the town where Australian legend Don Bradman was born has been turned into a museum.

articles.title: What we learned from watching the 1992 World Cup final in full again | ESPNcricinfo.com
articles.description: Wides, lbw calls, swing - plenty of things were different in white-ball cricket back then | ESPNcricinfo.com
articles.content: Last week, we at ESPNcricinfo did something we have been thinking of doing for eight years now: pretend-live ball-by-ball commentary for a classic cricket match. We knew the result, yes, but we tried… [+6823 chars]
